mapper.select: select qna_no as qnaNo, substr(replace(qna_writer,substr(qna_writer,2,2),'**'),1,instr(qna_writer,'@',1,1)-1)as qnaWriter, qna_title as qnaTitle, qna_content as qnaContent, qna_views as qnaViews, qna_date as qnaDate, qna_cate_no as qnaCateNo, qna_status as qnaStatus from(select rownum as rnum, q.* from(select * from qna_tbl order by 1 desc)q) where rnum between #{start} and #{end}

select qna_no as qnaNo, substr(replace(qna_writer,substr(qna_writer,2,2),'**'),1,instr(qna_writer,'@',1,1)-1)as qnaWriter, qna_title as qnaTitle, qna_content as qnaContent, qna_views as qnaViews, qna_date as qnaDate, qna_cate_no as qnaCateNo, qna_status as qnaStatus from qna_tbl
where qna_status = 0
where qna_status = 1
where qna_cate_no like '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
where qna_writer like '%'||#{keyword}||'%'

select report_no as reportNo, report_member_no as reportMemberNo, report_member_nickname as reportMemberNickname, reported_member_no as reportedMemberNo, reported_member_nickname as reportedMemberNickname, report_type as reportType, report_content as reportContent, report_date as reportDate, reportCount from (select rownum as rnum, r.* from(select * from report_tbl order by 1 desc)r) join (select count(reported_member_no)as reportCount, reported_member_no from report_tbl group by reported_member_no, report_member_nickname ) using (reported_member_no) where rnum between #{start} and #{end}
